sentence: Dumbest MF in DC Madison Cawthorn has been implicated in a potential insider trading scheme, and now likely violated House ethics rules with staff pay.
author: Scott Anderson
title: Kagro in the Morning podcast (AUDIO): Friday, May 6, 2022
